beer

Back-end event reader.

Make plots and tables of pnut outputs.

sspike.beer.bar_totals(sn, detector, totals=None, save=True, show=True)

Bar graph of event totals for a single model.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation specifications.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Detector specifications.

  • snow_events (dict of pd.DataFrame, optional) – Events dictionary from pnut.get_snowglobes_events(sn, detector).

  • save (bool, default True) – Save plot in sn.bin_dir.

  • show (bool, default True) – Display plot.

sspike.beer.plot_fluences(sn, flu=None, save=True, show=True)

Plot fluences at earth for a single model.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation specifications.

  • flu (pd.DataFrame, optional) – Fluences from pnut.get_luminosities(sn).

  • save (bool, default True) – Save plot in sn.bin_dir.

  • show (bool, default True) – Display plot.

sspike.beer.plot_luminosities(sn, lum=None, save=True, show=True)

Plot initial luminosities for a single model.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation specifications.

  • lum (pd.DataFrame, optional) – Luminosities from pnut.get_luminosities(sn).

  • save (bool, default True) – Save plot in sn.sn_dir.

  • show (bool, default True) – Display plot.

sspike.beer.plot_snowglobes_events(sn, detector, snow_events=None, save=True, show=True)

Plot SNOwGLoBES unsmeared and smeared event rates.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation specifications.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Detector specifications.

  • snow_events (dict of pd.DataFrame, optional) – Events dictionary from pnut.get_snowglobes_events(sn, detector).

  • save (bool, default True) – Save plot in sn.bin_dir.

  • show (bool, default True) – Display plot.

sspike.beer.plot_sspike_events(sn, detector, sspike_events=None, save=True, show=True)

Plot sspike event rates.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation specifications.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Detector specifications.

  • snow_events (dict of pd.DataFrame, optional) – Events dictionary from pnut.get_sspike_events(sn, detector).

  • save (bool, default True) – Save plot in sn.bin_dir.

  • show (bool, default True) – Display plot.
